name: 2D Platformer (Tutorial) (zoietsoi)
description:
My 2D Platformer game following the CAS 117 tutorials with no modifications.

My proposed modifications:

- Design: longer level where the key is at the end and you have to go back through the level to the door

- Aesthetic: redraw the platforms or the enemies

- Gameplay: add abilities where you can shoot the enemy instead of just jumping on their heads

Credits:

Created by Zoie Tsoi
